name: Chrome River Campground
description: Spend a few sunny days and starry nights beneath a canopy of old-growth firs at this enchanting spot by the Chrome River.

comments.text: The campground was beautiful, but the bugs could bite sometimes.
comments.author: Brennen Ech

comments.text: I caught a world-record-breaking trout here on my last visit.
comments.author: McKenzie Sebastian

comments.text: A wonderful place to reconnect with nature.
comments.author: Jordan Runn

comments.text: The stars at night were a revelation!
comments.author: Ann Dabramov
